memoria_instrucoes[0] <= 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000; // NOTHING
memoria_instrucoes[1] <= 32'b00111000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[2] <= 32'b01000000000100000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[3] <= 32'b00111000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[4] <= 32'b01000000010000000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[5] <= 32'b00001000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = .1 + .0 (add)
memoria_instrucoes[6] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[7] <= 32'b00111000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[8] <= 32'b01000000000100000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[9] <= 32'b00111000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[10] <= 32'b01000000010000000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[11] <= 32'b00011000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = .1 - .0 (sub)
memoria_instrucoes[12] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[13] <= 32'b00111000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[14] <= 32'b01000000000100000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[15] <= 32'b00111000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[16] <= 32'b01000000010000000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[17] <= 32'b10000000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = (.1 == .0) (equal)
memoria_instrucoes[18] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[19] <= 32'b00111000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[20] <= 32'b01000000000100000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[21] <= 32'b00111000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[22] <= 32'b01000000010000000000000000000000;  // output .1
	
memoria_instrucoes[23] <= 32'b01110000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = (.1 > .0) (more)
memoria_instrucoes[24] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[25] <= 32'b00111000000000000000000000000000;  // .0 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[26] <= 32'b01000000000100000000000000000000;  // output .0
memoria_instrucoes[27] <= 32'b00111000010000000000000000000001;  // .1 <- input
memoria_instrucoes[28] <= 32'b01000000010000000000000000000000;  // output .1

memoria_instrucoes[29] <= 32'b01111000100000100000000000000000;  // .2 = (.1 < .0) (less)
memoria_instrucoes[30] <= 32'b01000000101000000000000000000000;  // output .2
	
memoria_instrucoes[31] <= 32'b11111000000000000000000000000000;  // stop
